import React from "react"; import "./About.css"; import resume from "../../../image/Asadullah-Ahmed-Resume.pdf"; const About = () => { return (

About Me

Hello! I am Asadullah Ahmed. A Junior Web Developer. I Develop Frontend Web Applications and Back-end web Applications. my core skill is based on javascript and I love to do most of the things using javascript.

Download Resume
  • Age 21
  • Residence Bangladesh
  • Address Rajshahi, Bangladesh
  • Email asadullahahmed01@gmail.com
  • Hobby Programming
); }; export default About;
